title: Missing CRC calculation in Packet
description:
The crc field in Packet is always set to 0x00 and never computed before sending. If the device validates checksums, this could cause silent failures.

Location: librazer/src/packet.rs:44

```rust
crc: 0x00,  // Always zero - never computed
```

Either implement the checksum calculation or document why it's not needed.
close_reason: Implemented: Added calculate_crc() method and CRC is now computed in new() and set_args()

title: Early device detection breaks --help for auto mode
description: Location: razer-cli/src/main.rs:272-276. Device detection happens before argument parsing, so 'razer-cli auto --help' fails if no Razer device is connected. Defer device detection until after argument parsing.
close_reason: Fixed: Device detection is now deferred until after argument parsing, allowing --help to work without a device
